name: The Gift (itch) (4KbShort)
description:
Adventure Game made for MAGS March 2023!

This is a very quick GameJam game made for MAGS (Monthly Adventure Game Studio Jam) for March 2023. It's my first game made in AGS and it was done in about a week. Very sparse and incomplete, but it has an ending!

Update: Apparently, the first file uploaded did NOT include the EXE for the game so no one was able to run it. This has since been corrected. The current download can be run.

Please enjoy and thank you!
